title: WA Robot Release Response
description: Schema for the data field when calling 'wa robot release <pane_id>'. Releases a pane reservation.

pane_id.description: The pane ID whose reservation was released

released.description: True if a reservation was released, false if no matching reservation existed

reservation_id.description: ID of the released reservation (if released=true)

owner_kind.description: Owner type of the released reservation

owner_id.description: Owner ID of the released reservation

held_for_ms.description: How long the reservation was held before release

not_found_reason.description: If released=false, explains why (e.g., 'no reservation', 'not owner')
